DESCRIPTION: When you obtain #b4 #yBonding, choose a powerful #yBonding effect to receive.
Whenever you or Dragon attacks, the attacker gains #b1 Aggro. The character with higher Aggro becomes the #yFront, lower one becomes the #yRear.
The #yRear is not attacked by enemies. When the Aggro of the #yRear becomes higher than the #yFront, they #ySwitch their position.
The #yFront becomes the #yRear, and vice versa.
Taunted enemy will always target the user of this attack, ignoring #yAggro.
If you attack or an enemy attacks you before the effect kicks in, it is cancelled.
